A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not your typical Star Wars movie.  The first 7 star wars movies were action sci-fi films with.  While the last Jedi\, has sci-fi and some action\, the relationships and emotion seem to have more emphasis.  The movie has less of an epic feel than previous movies and feels more like a long chase sequence.  Overall the movie is mediocre at best and with a 2.5 hour runtime\, I will not be giving it a second  chance.
